title: The House on Blackstone Moor
description: Please note: this edition is no longer available (out of print).See the newly-edited version.The House on Blackstone Moor is a tale of vampirism, madness, obsession and devil worship as Rose Baines, only survivor of her familyâ€™s carnage, tells her story. Fragile, damaged by the tragedy, fate sends her to a desolate house on the haunted moors where demons dwell. The house and the moors have hideous secrets, yet there is love too; deep, abiding, eternal, but it comes with a price.
author: Carole Gill
